article_title: An-Li Herring, Author at Peninsula Press
article_text: An-Li is a law student and, as a reporter, hopes to convey the legal implications of the news. Having grown up in Pittsburgh as it recovered from the collapse of the steel industry, An-Li hopes to provide transactional support for sustainable economic development in the U.S. as an attorney.
